quotes.quote: Doing microservices just because everyone else is doing it is a terrible idea
quotes.author: Sam Newman

quotes.quote: If you do a big-bang rewrite, the only thing you're guaranteed of is a big bang

quotes.quote: Copy the questions, not the answers
quotes.author: Jessica Joy Kerr

quotes.quote: Just because software is deployed into a given environment doesn't mean it's actually being used by customers
quotes.author: Sam Newman

quotes.quote: Smart endpoints, dumb pipes
quotes.author: Sam Newman

quotes.quote: It turns out not knowing what you're doing and doing it anyway can have some pretty disastrous implications
quotes.author: Sam Newman

quotes.quote: It's a good idea not to make a bad situation any worse
quotes.author: Sam Newman

quotes.quote: Distributed Transactions - Just Say No
quotes.author: Sam Newman

quotes.quote: We replaced our monolith with micro services so that every outage could be more like a murder mystery
quotes.author: @Honest_update (twitter)

quotes.quote: ...making it hard to change a service contract is better than constantly breaking consumers
quotes.author: Sam Newman

quotes.quote: Microservices are definitely not for everyone
quotes.author: Sam Newman

quotes.quote: Users don't care about Microservices or the cloud; they care about outcomes
quotes.author: Vaughn Vernon

quotes.quote: You can't look at the competition and say you're going to do it better. You have to look at the competition and say you're going to do it differently
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Some men see things as they are and ask why. Others dream things that never were and ask why not
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: It's not the Monolith that's the problem - it's the mud
quotes.author: Vaughn Vernon

quotes.quote: The act of describing a program in unambiguous detail and the act of programming are one and the same
quotes.author: Kevlin Henney

quotes.quote: A checklist helps you focus on the hard parts of your task by taking your mind of trivial things
quotes.author: Mark Seeman
quotes.source: Code that fits in your head

quotes.quote: Providing technical expertise includes *not* confusing stakeholders with details they can't make sense of or use
quotes.author: Mark Seeman
quotes.source: Code that fits in your head

quotes.quote: The benefit of treating warnings as errors is that you add an *institutional* quality gate
quotes.author: Mark Seeman
quotes.source: Code that fits in your head

quotes.quote: The software exists to support the organisation in some way or other
quotes.author: Mark Seeman
quotes.source: Code that fits in your head

quotes.quote: Documentation should prioritise explaining *why* a decision was made, rather than *what* was decided
quotes.author: Mark Seeman
quotes.source: Code that fits in your head

quotes.quote: The goal is not to write code fast. The goal is sustainable software
quotes.author: Mark Seeman
quotes.source: Code that fits in your head

quotes.quote: The Red Green Refactor process is one of the most scientific methodologies of software engineering that I can think of
quotes.author: Mark Seeman
quotes.source: Code that fits in your head

quotes.quote: Log all impure actions, but no more
quotes.author: Mark Seeman
quotes.source: Code that fits in your head

quotes.quote: Meetings don't scale; documentation does
quotes.author: Mark Seeman
quotes.source: Code that fits in your head

quotes.quote: ...*encapsulation* should guarantee that an object can never be in an invalid state
quotes.author: Mark Seeman
quotes.source: Code that fits in your head

quotes.quote: Checklists will improve outcomes with no increase in skill
quotes.author: Atul Gawande
quotes.source: The Checklist Manifesto: How to Get Things Right

quotes.quote: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand
quotes.author: Martin Fowler
quotes.source: Refactoring: Improving the Design of Existing Code

quotes.quote: Code isn't an asset; it's a liability
quotes.author: Tim Ottinger

quotes.quote: Man kan godt håbe, der opstår magi. Man skal bare ikke regne med det
quotes.author: Daniel Frost

quotes.quote: ...mudslide-meets-shantytown systems
quotes.author: Vaughn Vernon

quotes.quote: Scrum should also have a burnout chart
quotes.author: Vaughn Vernon

quotes.quote: Alt kan ske i Jylland
quotes.author: Morten Brandenburg Mortensen

quotes.quote: Big design up front is dumb but doing no design up front is even dumber
quotes.author: Dave Thomas

quotes.quote: "Real self organization" is a requirement for an agile organization
quotes.author: Allen Holub

quotes.quote: SOLID is a set of rules that apply in a specific context, and since they don't specify the context, the assumption is that they apply everywhere
quotes.author: Dan North

quotes.quote: APIs are forever
quotes.author: James Higginbotham

quotes.quote: Resources Are Not Data Models
quotes.author: James Higginbotham

quotes.quote: Resources Are Not Object or Domain Models
quotes.author: James Higginbotham

quotes.quote: Total unification of the domain model for a large system will not be feasible or cost-effective
quotes.author: Eric Evans

quotes.quote: Software architecture is about the important stuff. Whatever that is.
quotes.author: Ralph Johnson

quotes.quote: ...all architectures are a product of their context
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: Unknown unknowns are the nemesis of software systems
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: All architectures become iterative because of unknown unknowns. Agile just recognizes this and does it sooner
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: Everything in software architecture is a trade-off
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: If an architect thinks they have discovered something that isn't a trade-off, more likely the just haven't identified the trade-off yet
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: Why is more important than how
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: All architectures become iterative because of unknown unknowns. Agile just recognizes this and does it sooner
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: Architecture is the stuff you can't Google
quotes.author: Mark Richards

quotes.quote: There are not right or wrong answers in architecture - only trade-offs
quotes.author: Neal Ford

quotes.quote: There are no wrong answers in architecture - only expensive ones
quotes.author: Neal Ford

quotes.quote: Any list of architecture characteristics will necessarily be an incomplete list
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: Never shoot for the *best* architecture, but rather the *least worst* architecture
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: The bounded context concept recognizes that each entity works best within a localized context
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: ...exponential growth isn't kind to architectural decisions
quotes.author: Martin Fowler

quotes.quote: Few unitary architectures exist outside embedded systems
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: Distributed architectures cost significantly more than monolithic architectures
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: The main issue with asynchronous communication is error handling
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: The negative trade-off of reuse is coupling
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: Iteration is the only way to ensure good service design
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: Don't do transactions in microservices - fix granularity instead
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: Providing the business value when justifying decisions is vitally important for any architecture decision
quotes.author: Mark Richards, Neal Ford

quotes.quote: Developers are drawn to complexity like moths to a flame - frequently with the same result
quotes.author: Neal Ford

quotes.quote: Software design is an exercise in human relationships
quotes.author: Kent Beck

quotes.quote: Coupling drives the cost of software
quotes.author: Kent Beck

quotes.quote: The goal is the commitment
quotes.author: Andrea L

quotes.quote: SAFe tames flow by slowing it to the point of stasis. Not a good outcome, I think
quotes.author: Allen Holub

quotes.quote: We need to put the team first, advocating for restricting their cognitive loads
quotes.author: Matthew Skelton, Manuel Pais

quotes.quote: The fundamental means of delivery is the team
quotes.author: Matthew Skelton, Manuel Pais

quotes.quote: Collaboration is expensive
quotes.author: Matthew Skelton, Manuel Pais

quotes.quote: Teams should be stable but not static
quotes.author: Matthew Skelton, Manuel Pais

quotes.quote: For architects, every problem is a snowflake
quotes.author: Neal Ford, Mark Richards, Parmod Adalage, Zhamak Dehghani

quotes.quote: Data is a precious thing and will last longer than the systems themselves
quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee
